column4: can anyone tell me how to set the mouse-wheel to be able to change between virtual desktops??
use the scroll wheel on the window boxes, lower right
right i got that...i was wondering if there was a way to change that so if u use it anwhere on the desktop it'll work?
no. The window manager wouldn't know whether or not to keep scrolling the windows, or scroll in the window you dropped into from the desktop change
